****EDIT****
Well i got it working and started on a map henit crashed. I then tried to reload it and i again had to set up the files and crap. After doing this twice ive given up and sticking to half-life 2 map making on SDK
Thanks for the support though!!

item.title: Half-life 1 map maker?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
If you want to be able to run HL from the editor, you’ll need to tell Hammer to run steam, and then set the parameters to run HL’s Steam ID with any additional game parameters you want (such as sv_cheats 1 and developer 1)

I also recommend The Compilator for final compiles (you can set a bunch of settings such as wadinclude, smooth and various other standard compile tool settings easily within the GUI) And SHLT for your compile tools (It’s an upgraded version of ZHLT)

item.title: Half-life 1 map maker?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Hammer 3.5 (latest build for HL) and links to other tools
Helpful forum and tutorials.
Oh, you’ll also need Zoner’s HL tools for turning the RMF/MAP into a BSP so you can play it, and the HL 3.5 FGD file. It helps if you extract the entire “models” folder from your PAK or GCF so you can see the models.
